Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: Any reason why this is a sub-task of FAB-15490?

Action.author: wenjian
Action.body: As we discussed at the scrum, we need an end2end test for GetHistoryForKey. Since FAB-15490 updates historydb key, this ticket was created as a subtask to complete e2e test for GetHistoryForKey.

Action.author: wenjian
Action.body: This subtask may be moved to FAB-15894 because item 44 is about getHistoryForMarble.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: I changed subtask to a testtask, so it can stand on its own.
